page.title: 02CLUBS, KINGSBARNS
page.content: {THE MEN'S CLUB THIS MEETS ON MONDAYS AND THURSDAYS DURING THE WINTER MONTHS IN THE OLD LIBRARY. THE GAMES PLAYED ARE BILLIARDS, CARPET BOWLS, DOMINOES AND DARTS. CASH PRIZES ARE PLAYED FOR EVERY MONTH. THERE ARE ALSO THE MAIN COMPETITIONS. AT THE END OF THE SEASON A LADIES' NIGHT IS HELD. AFTER REFRESHMENTS, THE TROPHIES ARE AWARDED. THE YOUTH CLUB THIS MEETS EVERY TUESDAY EVENING. THE GAMES PLAYED ARE SNOOKER, POOL, TABLE TENNIS, SOFT BALL, CARDS, DOMINOES AND SNAKES AND LADDERS. THERE IS ALSO DANCING AND ARTS AND CRAFTS. THE GOLF CLUB GOLF IS PLAYED AT CRAIL THREE MILES AWAY. W.R.I. MEETS ONCE PER MONTH
